items.sentence: Tom had hoped he wouldn't be asked to do that.
Tom is still not very good at swimming, is he?
Tom did something that he shouldn't have done.
Perhaps you should ask Tom to do that for you.
I heard that Tom and Mary are getting married.
Do you think I'll be able to get into Harvard?
Tom and I went to a concert yesterday evening.
I've been to Boston several times on business.
Tom said he'd never eaten such delicious rice.
I’m guessing you didn’t buy this for yourself.
